Catalog_Raisonne: R 19 ii or iii/iii; B19; F19 iii/iii
artist: Joseph Mallord William Turner R.A.; Mezzotint by Charles Turner
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: Inscribed in the plate: above the image: Ms.; below the image: Little Devils Bridge over the Russ above Altdorft Swissd.; and: Drawn & Etched by J.M.W. Turner Esqr. R.A.P.P.; and: Engraved by Chas. Turner.; and: London Published March 29. 1809, by C. Turner; No. 50, Warren Street Fitzroy Square
medium: Etching and mezzotint in sepia ink
provenance: William M. Ladd, Portland, Ore., sold to Jones; Herschel V. Jones, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1916.
title: Little Devil's Bridge over the Russ above Altdorft, Switzerland
